channel.title: [Delta]StormyNight Version 1.3 Alpha[Delta] (12/7/2013) dungeoneering base!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/25082kl.jpg[/img] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ *NOTE*I have Removed older updates due to the fact of how much info this thread was getting...I will update this thread next update with the older Updates loged, so that is how I will be doing it so this thread doesn't create a lag. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ UPDATE: 12/7/2013
Info-Been doing major deving on both the client and server side
What have I done? -Gain two members in deving...they handle the server side as I work on the Client -Added working hp and prayer orbs -Nocliping is complete -Added working Emote tab, updated version, not counting server side -Added updated Attack interface, magic attack interface a little buggy. Won't update still running off the old one -Changed the xp lock system over to the "mouse buttons" tab in the wrench part due to Emote tab updated -Added new Skill interface, gotta add hovers to it. -Added new sprites, by Server Dev-Yougetowned -Added new theving interface, still 5% left till its finish, by Server Dev-Struck -Moved Corp to Near Reality's Corps spawn -Added Battle Mages too Mage Arena -Finish Tav Dungeon Spawns -Finish Brimhaven Spawns, not counting dungeoneering portion of the Dung -Animated Hell Hounds and Kalphite Queen -Fixed Dung bug -Fixed pk point bug -Added Donator shop, along with primal weapons and armor -Added Loyalty Sigs -Cleaned up the Models folder -Added Lunars -Added Equipment Screen to see stats and Items on death
Media [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/f3dgd1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/9u981s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/23r2zoj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2s6aoev.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2h58nya.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/5xk9wk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/335fhvp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2gvv9ft.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ihnlg4.png[/img]
What next? -Well my big project that I'm going to do is try and move the logout button to the "X" logout near the orbs and add the clan chat interface and get clan chat work. -The other Staff Member will be setting up a better skilling layout to the server to create a eco for skillers. -Then as always what ever comes to our minds lol
Now its your time to give feedback, I accept all feedback even the bad ones since I believe if you fix whats bad then it will be great, so hope you enjoy and I'll be updating this page as I update the Server, so hoped you enjoyed. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ About StormyNight/Me I started programing this private server since freshman year of high school...now I'm a senior. I quiet for a year due to my love of Halo, yet not I got bored of it and started programming this server hardcore. The old name use to be "FunScape", yet I got a alot of hate for it and changed it to "StormyNight." Right now its just me and my friend working on it, he just likes modeling kingdom hearts stuff, which we are still working on and planing to add a minigame around kingdom hearts. The idea of creating StormyNight on how it is today started when I stepped into the World of "Near Reality" which inspires me to create the best private server to my ability with the help of you guys. StormyNight will spread great gameplay while keeping the competitiveness alive. This server will go online when I'm done and hope it grabs people's and hopefully your attention in wanting to join a new and fresh community.

Why use delta???
[/quote]problem? don’t base a server on the original source used but on the content/how well the current source is programmed.[/quote]

item.title: [Delta]StormyNight Version 1.3 Alpha[Delta] (12/7/2013) dungeoneering base!
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

that background behind your tabs is horrid just saying. good luck none the less.

lol i love the background just that small sprite thing I’m going to fix with the pillar, and great work on your server too

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:23, topic:515546”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=633801.msg4382657#msg4382657 date=1384105906]

a lot of this stuff just looks like tutorials, content is way too generic

Some yes, but not all. And what you mean generic?

generic… typical… not unique. like for example: project insanity is a very generic server base, honda civic is a very generic car, etc.

I see what you mean, so is my server generic because its delta?
[/quote]
nope, all I’m trying to say is you should try adding unique never seen before content. it makes you a better programmer, and gets people interested in your development[/quote]

I see what you mean, but I think my server is somewhat different

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]StormyNight Version 1.3 Alpha[Delta] (12/7/2013) dungeoneering base!
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:1, topic:515546”]

25082kl.jpg1000×800 

UPDATE : 5/11/2013
Info- Its almost time to release this server out to the world for the beta month (unofficial date: June 2 starting date), and then after the beta one week up updating it base on feedback with bugs...exc.

So what did i do in four days?
-added a news pop up which tells people to vote and check out the forums
-fixed up some spells such as changing "0/2" to "0/0"..runes needed
-fliped the "gain" and "lock" option from the xp lock system picture below to make it feel more natural
-got 95% done with the dungeoneering (beta base)

heres a video to show you more about it (you might need to turn up your volume since i don't talk super loud lol)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4cjuv1SYdvo&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

What to come?
-work on some spell teleportation
-well..what ever comes to mind

Now its your time to give feedback, I accept all feedback even the bad ones since I believe if you fix whats bad then it will be great, so hope you enjoy and I'll be updating this page as I update the Server, so hoped you enjoyed.

UPDATE: 5/7/2013
Its be awhile since my last update and got a great deal of stuff done!
-Dark Bow works now…it shoots arrows now
-added choatics that work? //I’m not for sure what they must have but they got the stats and crap
-5% done with dungeoneering //remember this is a delta so I had to wing it, but same concept
-A custom lock system

-fixed up the quest tab (don’t show all those crapy quest names and junk)
-no need for a energy command…made it where you are always running

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WkWlaGzzJFE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

What to come
-finish dungeoneering
-and other random stuff

UPDATE: 4/25/2013
yea I know it was a fast update but finally figured out some of the code and fixed it
-fixed pvp drops..custom items drop now (had to change a number)
-working dclaws in pvp now (4 spec is buggy and some reason won't work in pvp without a client error)
-85% done with Donor area (still some skills need to be work on)
-added three hard scroll training (here are the pictures too them..pretty cool places to put them :)

first: A cross of blood!
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/6rrdp0.png[/img]

second: Next to a banner deep in the darkness, It's are last stand!
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/34z0ynl.png[/img]

Third: Under a lamp, behind the Castle!
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/qo87bk.png[/img]

Whats next:
-well its the dark bow..need to make it shoot arrows
-add zammork godwars
-fix some prices on items
-and finish donor area
-npcdrops

UPDATE: 4/23/2013

-I added three level two clue scrolls heres some pictures of what they are-
first: I see red, but I’m surrounded by blue!

29q13xv.png761×453

Second: Big green plants, Big green trees, and Big green giants!

55mao2.png773×455

Third: South of the bin with green!

qxucdf.png758×452

*I finish Castle wars and has a somewhat working point system…It gives you at random up to 10 points per a round
*70% done with the Donor zone
*fixed up prices

What to come:
-become motivated to fix the dbow and dclaws working on that this week and should be ready by this weeken

Other news: I bought my self a notebook so i can study my sources code after my TAKS test tomorrow lol I guess I can do something that doesn’t bored me lol

UPDATE: 4/13/2013
 *Fixed Prayer icon for protect for melee
 *Barrows is finish (its NR style, but armor can get damage)
 *Rebuild lumby is 55% done, i redid it my way, yet the npcs are still there just change the shop
 *Cooking works out lumby castle, cooking beef and chicken works
 *Jad and his budies are multicombat now
 *Created a website but it sucks lol

What to come:
-Zamorak godwars
-finish donor zone
-fix dbow
-fix chicken npc

About StormyNight/Me
I started programing this private server since freshman year of high school…now I’m a junior. I quiet for a year due to my love of Halo, yet not I got bored of it and started programming this server hardcore. The old name use to be “FunScape”, yet I got a alot of hate for it and changed it to “StormyNight.” Right now its just me and my friend working on it, he just likes modeling kingdom hearts stuff, which we are still working on and planing to add a minigame around kingdom hearts. The idea of creating StormyNight on how it is today started when I stepped into the World of “Near Reality” which inspires me to create the best private server to my ability with the help of you guys. StormyNight will spread great gameplay while keeping the competitiveness alive. This server will go online when I’m done and hope it grabs people’s and hopefully your attention in wanting to join a new and fresh community.

What have my friend and I done?
-Working Slayer system
-All Working non-combat skills
-Custom Items (who cares)
-PkShop that takes PkPoints
-Working Minigames
-Three out of Four Gods working for God Wars
-Similar way to get a Fire cape like “Near Reality”
-All Skillcapes
-Cooking on Fires
-FunPk
-In Game HighScores
-Updated Inventory
-Working Pest Control
-Barrows similar to “Near Reality” style
-A basic Construction system
-Castle Wars
-Dicing
-Claws spec
-and More
I could continue on what I added but then this list would never end, but heres a video of some basic stuff I added on the server and hope you enjoy.
[youtube]http://youtu.be/55vNw0iwgrc[/youtube]

Here are some bugs we are working on right now
-Dark Bow shooting arrows and doing damage
-Prayer–> Protect from melee (when activated)
-Added Items, like Torva, drop on death

What too come!
-Zamork boss
-Animations for updated npcs
-Finishing donnor area
-Text icons for donators and other staff
-and more[/quote]
I like the dung.
One issue i saw
The hitsplats on all the damage you deal and the overhead hp are different?
120/99?
Fix dat.

Read full topic
